name: Lovers (RyderDev)
description:
CONTROLS (PLEASE READ):

Jump - Space

Left, Right - A,D

Throw Rope - E

Switch Players - F

Hold Space to Climb Rope

Jump on Other Players Head for Jump Boost

One way Doors for both Pink and Blue

Step on Button to Open Doors

This Game is about two lovers completing puzzles together, but along the way you find another girl and have and affair with her, after many adventures with both girls you get to choose who you like best.  The game was made for the Hyper Casual Game Jam and I made it in two days. I really hope you enjoy and please post any bugs or feedback in the form. Thanks!
